title: Increase labor, decrease capital with given data

content.question:
At its current employment level of labor and capital, a firm observes the following.

Marginal product of labor = 30 units

Marginal product of capital = 60 units

Price of labor = $3 per unit

Price of capital = $15 per unit

Which of the following actions should the firm take in order to achieve the least-cost combination of labor and capital and produce the same level of output?

choices.label:
Labor
 Capital

No change
 No change
